question.title: id 'com.andoid.application' version '8.9.1' , apply : false was not found
question.body:
I installed Android Studio and when Gradle wants to syc, it created the following error:

Plugin [id: 'com.andoid.application' version '8.9.1' , apply: false] was not found in any of the following resource

My gradle-wrapper.properies is:

distributionBase=GRADLE_USER_HOME
distributionPath=wrapper/dists
distributionUrl=https\://services.gradle.org/distributions/gradle-8.11.1-bin.zip
zipStoreBase=GRADLE_USER_HOME
zipStorePath=wrapper/dists

And my gradle-properties is:

org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx2048m -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8
android.useAndroidX=true
android.nonTransitiveRClass=true

My Android Studio version is AI-243.24978.46.2431.13208083, Android Studio Meerkat | 2024.3.1 Patch 1

My build.gradle.kts is:

plugins {
    alias(libs.plugins.android.application) apply false
}

The log created is:

Build file '/home/mohsen/AndroidStudioProjects/aya/build.gradle.kts' line: 2

Plugin [id: 'com.android.application', version: '8.9.1', apply: false] was not found in any of the following sources:

* Try:
> Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.
> Run with --scan to get full insights.
> Get more help at https://help.gradle.org.

* Exception is:
org.gradle.api.plugins.UnknownPluginException: Plugin [id: 'com.android.application', version: '8.9.1', apply: false] was not found in any of the following sources:

- Gradle Core Plugins (plugin is not in 'org.gradle' namespace)
- Included Builds (No included builds contain this plugin)
- Plugin Repositories (could not resolve plugin artifact 'com.android.application:com.android.application.gradle.plugin:8.9.1')
  Searched in the following repositories:
    Google
    MavenRepo
    Gradle Central Plugin Repository

By the way, it wants to get 8.9.1, but gradle-wrapper.properties is 8.11.1.

How can I solve it?

UPDATE:
My settings.gradle.kts is:

pluginManagement {
    repositories {
        google {
            content {
                includeGroupByRegex("com\\.android.*")
                includeGroupByRegex("com\\.google.*")
                includeGroupByRegex("androidx.*")
            }
        }
        mavenCentral()
        gradlePluginPortal()
    }
}
dependencyResolutionManagement {
    repositoriesMode.set(RepositoriesMode.FAIL_ON_PROJECT_REPOS)
    repositories {
        google()
        mavenCentral()
    }
}

rootProject.name = "aya"
include(":app")

NEW UPDATE:
Along with above error, I get the following error message:

Code insight is unavailable (script configuration wasn't recieved)

question_comments.body: i just suggestion first step create new empty project in android studio try it if proper create project or not?
@meet , I put my build.gradel.kts in my post.
@meet , I think build.gradle.kts is imperfect. I don't know to fill up it.
i think some thing is mistake can three file add first was libs.versions.toml file it. second root build build.gradle.kts and third file app folder build.gradle.kts
@meet, Yes I changed and in error message I see 8.7.3 instead of 8.9.1
can you edit question add libs.versions.toml file
@meet , do you know another available version?
@meet , I achanged to 8.7.3 but I get same error with 8.7.3 .
version: '8.9.1 not available so change it  8.7.3
@MarkRotteveel I updated my question and put my settings.gradle.kts contents
open libs.versions.toml file it. You have an r missing, It should be com.android.application
What is the contents of your settings.gradle.kts?
@tyg The full error does use com.android.application, so I guess it's some kind of transcription error from the OP.
Regarding "By the way, it wants to get 8.9.1, but gradle-wrapper.properties is 8.11.1.", you're confusing the Android plugin version with the Gradle Wrapper version...
You have an r missing, It should be com.android.application.
